verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man שִׂ֤ים <WH7760> set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> thy face אֶל־ <WH413> toward יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> toward Jerusalem וְהַטֵּ֖ף <WH5197> and drop אֶל־ <WH413> against מִקְדָּשִׁ֑ים <WH4720> [thy word] toward the holy places וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> and prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> against אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> against the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <WH559> And say לְאַדְמַ֣ת <WH127> to the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold אֵלַ֔יִךְ <WH413> I am against וְהוֹצֵאתִ֥י <WH3318> Behold I [am] against thee and will draw forth חַרְבִּ֖י <WH2719> my sword מִתַּעְרָ֑הּ <WH8593> out of his sheath וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> and will cut off מִמֵּ֖ךְ <WH4480> at צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> from thee the righteous וְרָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> and the wicked

יַ֛עַן <WH3282> Seeing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I הִכְרַ֥תִּי <WH3772> then that I will cut off מִמֵּ֖ךְ <WH4480> at צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> from thee the righteous וְרָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> and the wicked לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> therefore תֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> go forth חַרְבִּ֧י <WH2719> therefore shall my sword מִתַּעְרָ֛הּ <WH8593> out of his sheath אֶל־ <WH413> against כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> against all flesh מִנֶּ֥גֶב <WH5045> from the south צָפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> to the north

וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> may know כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> That all flesh כִּ֚י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I the LORD הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <WH3318> have drawn forth חַרְבִּ֖י <WH2719> my sword מִתַּעְרָ֑הּ <WH8593> out of his sheath לֹ֥א <WH3808> It will not תָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> it shall not return עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again ס

וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> therefore thou son אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man הֵֽאָנַ֑ח <WH584> Sigh בְּשִׁבְר֤וֹן <WH7670> with the breaking מָתְנַ֙יִם֙ <WH4975> of [thy] loins וּבִמְרִיר֔וּת <WH4814> and with bitterness תֵּֽאָנַ֖ח <WH584> sigh לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> before their eyes

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> and shall be brought to pass כִּֽי־ <WH3588> and when יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And it shall be when they say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> Because עַל־ <WH5921> and מָ֖ה <WH4100> how long אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> Wherefore נֶאֱנָ֑ח <WH584> unto thee Wherefore sighest וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <WH559> thou? that thou shalt answer אֶל־ <WH413> Because שְׁמוּעָ֣ה <WH8052> For the tidings כִֽי־ <WH3588> and when בָאָ֡ה <WH935> because it cometh וְנָמֵ֣ס <WH4549> shall melt כָּל־ <WH3605> and every לֵב֩ <WH3820> and every heart וְרָפ֨וּ <WH7503> shall be feeble כָל־ <WH3605> all יָדַ֜יִם <WH3027> and all hands וְכִהֲתָ֣ה <WH3543> shall faint כָל־ <WH3605> every ר֗וּחַ <WH7307> and every spirit וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בִּרְכַּ֙יִם֙ <WH1290> and all knees תֵּלַ֣כְנָה <WH1980> will be weak מַּ֔יִם <WH4325> [as] water הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold בָאָה֙ <WH935> behold it cometh וְנִֽהְיָ֔תָה <WH1961> become נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הִנָּבֵא֙ <WH5012> prophesy וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> and say כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> the Lord אֱמֹ֕ר <WH559> Say חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> A sword חֶ֛רֶב <WH2719> a sword הוּחַ֖דָּה <WH2300> is sharpened וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also מְרוּטָֽה׃ <WH4803> and also furbished

לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> because of טְבֹ֤חַ <WH2874> to make a sore טֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2873> slaughter הוּחַ֔דָּה <WH2300> It is sharpened לְמַעַן־ <WH4616> because of הֱיֵה־ <WH1961> become לָ֥הּ בָּ֖רָק <WH1300> that it may glitter מֹרָ֑טָּה <WH4803> Polished א֣וֹ <WH176> should נָשִׂ֔ישׂ <WH7797> we then make mirth שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> the rod בְּנִ֖י <WH1121> of my son מֹאֶ֥סֶת <WH3988> ? it contemneth כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> [as] every tree

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> And he hath given אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> לְמָרְטָ֖ה <WH4803> it to be furbished לִתְפֹּ֣שׂ <WH8610> may be handled בַּכָּ֑ף <WH3709> branch הִֽיא־ <WH1931> he הוּחַ֤דָּה <WH2300> is sharpened חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> this sword וְהִ֣יא <WH1931> he מֹרָ֔טָּה <WH4803> and polished לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> בְּיַד־ <WH3027> it into the hand הוֹרֵֽג׃ <WH2026> of the slayer

זְעַ֤ק <WH2199> Cry וְהֵילֵל֙ <WH3213> and howl בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man כִּי־ <WH3588> for הִיא֙ <WH1931> he הָיתָ֣ה <WH1961> is against בְעַמִּ֔י <WH5971> for it shall be upon my people הִ֖יא <WH1931> he בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> it [shall be] upon all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מְגוּרֵ֤י <WH4048> terrors אֶל־ <WH413> by reason of חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> the sword הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become אֶת־ <WH854> with עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> shall be upon my people לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> therefore סְפֹ֥ק <WH5606> smite אֶל־ <WH413> about יָרֵֽךְ׃ <WH3409> therefore upon [thy] thigh

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because בֹ֔חַן <WH974> Because [it is] a trial וּמָ֕ה <WH4100> and what אִם־ <WH518> if גַּם־ <WH1571> even שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> the rod מֹאֶ֖סֶת <WH3988> and what if [the sword] contemn לֹ֣א <WH3808> will be no יִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> declares אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> Thou therefore son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man הִנָּבֵ֕א <WH5012> prophesy וְהַ֖ךְ <WH5221> together כַּ֣ף <WH3709> hands אֶל־ <WH413> about כָּ֑ף <WH3709> hands וְתִכָּפֵ֞ל <WH3717> be doubled חֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> and let the sword שְׁלִישִׁ֙תָה֙ <WH7992> the third חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> time the sword חֲלָלִ֔ים <WH2491> of the slain הִ֗יא <WH1931> It חֶ֚רֶב <WH2719> it [is] the sword חָלָ֣ל <WH2491> [men that are] slain הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> of the great הַחֹדֶ֖רֶת <WH2314> which entereth into their privy chambers לָהֶֽם׃

לְמַ֣עַן ׀ <WH4616> because of לָמ֣וּג <WH4127> may faint לֵ֗ב <WH3820> that [their] heart וְהַרְבֵּה֙ <WH7235> be multiplied הַמִּכְשֹׁלִ֔ים <WH4383> and [their] ruins עַ֚ל <WH5921> at כָּל־ <WH3605> all שַׁ֣עֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8179> against all their gates נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> I have set אִבְחַת־ <WH19> the point חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword אָ֛ח <WH253> ah עֲשׂוּיָ֥ה <WH6213> [it is] made לְבָרָ֖ק <WH1300> bright מְעֻטָּ֥ה <WH4593> [it is] wrapped up לְטָֽבַח׃ <WH2875> Tebah

הִתְאַחֲדִ֥י <WH258> Go thee one way or other הֵימִ֖נִי <WH3231> the right hand הָשִׂ֣ימִי <WH7760> [either] on הַשְׂמִ֑ילִי <WH8041> [or] on the left אָ֖נָה <WH575> whithersoever פָּנַ֥יִךְ <WH6440> thy face מֻעָדֽוֹת׃ <WH3259> [is] set

וְגַם־ <WH1571> will also אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I אַכֶּ֤ה <WH5221> I will also smite כַפִּי֙ <WH3709> mine hands אֶל־ <WH413> about כַּפִּ֔י <WH3709> together וַהֲנִחֹתִ֖י <WH5117> to rest חֲמָתִ֑י <WH2534> and I will cause my fury אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> have said פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me again saying

וְאַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> Also thou son אָדָ֜ם <WH120> of man שִׂים־ <WH7760> appoint לְךָ֣ ׀ שְׁנַ֣יִם <WH8147> thee two דְּרָכִ֗ים <WH1870> ways לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> may come חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> that the sword מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> land אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> out of one יֵצְא֣וּ <WH3318> shall come forth שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8147> both twain וְיָ֣ד <WH3027> thou a place בָּרֵ֔א <WH1254> and choose בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> [it] at the head דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> of the way עִ֖יר <WH5892> to the city בָּרֵֽא׃ <WH1254> choose

דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> a way תָּשִׂ֔ים <WH7760> Appoint לָב֣וֹא <WH935> may come חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> that the sword אֵ֖ת <WH853> רַבַּ֣ת <WH7237> to Rabbath בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the sons עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> and to Judah בִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem בְּצוּרָֽה׃ <WH1219> the defenced

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָמַ֨ד <WH5975> stood מֶלֶךְ־ <WH4428> For the king בָּבֶ֜ל <WH894> of Babylon אֶל־ <WH413> at אֵ֣ם <WH517> at the parting הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> of the way בְּרֹ֛אשׁ <WH7218> at the head שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> of the two הַדְּרָכִ֖ים <WH1870> ways לִקְסָם־ <WH7080> to use קָ֑סֶם <WH7081> divination קִלְקַ֤ל <WH7043> bright בַּֽחִצִּים֙ <WH2671> he made [his] arrows שָׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> he consulted בַּתְּרָפִ֔ים <WH8655> with images רָאָ֖ה <WH7200> he looked בַּכָּבֵֽד׃ <WH3516> in the liver

בִּֽימִינ֞וֹ <WH3225> At his right hand הָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> came הַקֶּ֣סֶם <WH7081> was the divination יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> for Jerusalem לָשׂ֤וּם <WH7760> to appoint כָּרִים֙ <WH3733> captains לִפְתֹּ֤חַ <WH6605> to open פֶּה֙ <WH6310> the mouth בְּרֶ֔צַח <WH7524> in the slaughter לְהָרִ֥ים <WH7311> to lift up ק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> with shouting לָשׂ֤וּם <WH7760> to appoint כָּרִים֙ <WH3733> [battering] rams עַל־ <WH5921> against שְׁעָרִ֔ים <WH8179> against the gates לִשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <WH8210> to cast סֹלְלָ֖ה <WH5550> a mount לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> [and] to build דָּיֵֽק׃ <WH1785> a fort

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become לָהֶ֤ם [כִּקְסֹום־ כ] (כִּקְסָם־ <WH7080> divination שָׁוְא֙ <WH7080> divination ק) בְּעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> in their sight שְׁבֻעֵ֥י <WH7650> to them that have sworn שְׁבֻע֖וֹת <WH7621> oaths לָהֶ֑ם וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> he מַזְכִּ֥יר <WH2142> but he will call to remembrance עָוֹ֖ן <WH5771> the iniquity לְהִתָּפֵֽשׂ׃ <WH8610> that they may be taken פ

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Because הַזְכַּרְכֶם֙ <WH2142> to be remembered עֲוֹ֣נְכֶ֔ם <WH5771> Because ye have made your iniquity בְּהִגָּל֣וֹת <WH1540> are discovered פִּשְׁעֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6588> in that your transgressions לְהֵֽרָאוֹת֙ <WH7200> do appear חַטֹּ֣אותֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2403> your sins בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all עֲלִילֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5949> so that in all your doings יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Because הִזָּ֣כֶרְכֶ֔ם <WH2142> because [I say] that ye are come to remembrance בַּכַּ֖ף <WH3709> with the hand תִּתָּפֵֽשׂוּ׃ <WH8610> ye shall be taken פ

וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> O חָלָ֣ל <WH2491> And thou profane רָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> wicked נְשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> prince יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose בָּ֣א <WH935> is come יוֹמ֔וֹ <WH3117> whose day בְּעֵ֖ת <WH6256> when עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> iniquity קֵֽץ׃ <WH7093> [shall have] an end ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3068> GOD הָסִיר֙ <WH5493> Remove הַמִּצְנֶ֔פֶת <WH4701> the diadem וְהָרִ֖ים <WH7311> and take off הָֽעֲטָרָ֑ה <WH5850> the crown זֹ֣את <WH2063> this [shall] not [be] the same לֹא־ <WH3808> no זֹ֔את <WH2063> that הַשָּׁפָ֣לָה <WH8217> [him that is] low הַגְבֵּ֔הַ <WH1361> exalt וְהַגָּבֹ֖הַ <WH8213> and abase הַשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <WH1364> [him that is] high
